column1: Daily Weather Observations for Richmond, New South Wales for June 2021
Prepared at 13:00 UTC on Monday 18 October 2021   IDCJDW2119.202106
Most observations from the RAAF base, but evaporation from the Hawkesbury campus of the University of Western Sydney.
These evaporation observations will generally be available about month after they are made.
Temperature, humidity, wind, pressure, cloud and rainfall observations are from Richmond RAAF {station 067105}
Evaporation observations are from Richmond - UWS Hawkesbury {station 067021}
